title: The logic is incorrect when a filter is added to the table on the layout
description: We consume that the dataset has 10 records (DataResultA).
OB: When dragging the dataset to the layout and setting another filter (FilterB) on the table, the actual result is that the result of FilterB is based on DataResultA.
EB: The expected result is that the result of FilterB should be based on DataResultB.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a report and add a new data source and dataset. 2. Set a filter (FilterA) in the dataset and obtain 6 records (DataResultB). 3. Drag the dataset to the layout and set another filter (FilterB) on the table.
